title: Specialized biycles font
content:
Hi there - does anyone know the correct font fpr the attached Specialized images ?

i’m about to have my Allez model powder coated and then i want to affix ’water transfer’ decals (which i can print off at home)

Appreciate the help.

cheers

jeremy

from chilly England

author: jwoodru1
